      • rejectNewPinFor

        public static void rejectNewPinFor(Appliance appliance)
        Reject a new pin for an appliance.

        When the appliance has a stored pin and a new (mismatching) pin was received, this method rejects that new pin. The currently stored pin will remain untouched.

        Parameters:
        appliance - the appliance to reject the new pin for

      • acceptNewPinFor

        public static void acceptNewPinFor(Appliance appliance)
        Accept new pin for an appliance.

        When the appliance has a stored pin and a new (mismatching) pin was received, this accepts that new pin. The currently stored pin will be overwritten with the new pin and the mismatched pin will be cleared.

        Parameters:
        appliance - the appliance to accept the new pin for

      • findAppliancesWithMismatchedPinIn

        public static <A extends Appliance> Set<A> findAppliancesWithMismatchedPinIn(Set<A> appliances)
        Find appliances with a mismatched pin.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the appliance type parameter
        Parameters:
        appliances - the appliances to find the appliances with a mismatched pin in, usually retrieved from the ApplianceManager.
        Returns:
        the set of appliances that have a mismatched pin
